tellurium.tests.test_runner module¶

Test utilities for tellurium.

class tellurium.tests.test_runner.TestRunner[source]¶

Bases: object

Test modules have the pattern test_*.py and must be located in the directory of this module.

static find_test_modules()[source]¶
static run_all()[source]¶

Run all unittests of tellurium.

Returns:results of unittest
Return type:unittest.TextTestResult
te_passes_tests()[source]¶

Did tellurium pass the tests?

import tellurium.tests.test_runner as tetest
runner = tetest.TestRunner()
runner.te_passes_tests()
Returns:True if passed
Return type:bool
